comment: Mapping of local planning authorities that share joint local plans on shared websites

local-authority:BOT.name: Boston Borough Council
local-authority:BOT.notes: Shares local plan with South Holland. Note: Lincolnshire County is not an LPA for planning purposes.

local-authority:SNO.name: South Norfolk Council
local-authority:SNO.notes: Shares local plan with Broadland and Norwich City (also part of Greater Norwich Local Plan)

local-authority:BRO.name: Broadland District Council
local-authority:BRO.notes: Shares local plan with Norwich City and South Norfolk (also part of Greater Norwich Local Plan)

local-authority:NOW.name: Norwich City Council
local-authority:NOW.notes: Shares local plan with Broadland and South Norfolk (also part of Greater Norwich Local Plan)

local-authority:LIC.name: City of Lincoln Council
local-authority:LIC.notes: Shares local plan with North Kesteven and West Lindsey

local-authority:NKE.name: North Kesteven District Council
local-authority:NKE.notes: Shares local plan with Lincoln and West Lindsey

local-authority:WLI.name: West Lindsey District Council
local-authority:WLI.notes: Shares local plan with Lincoln and North Kesteven

local-authority:BAB.name: Babergh District Council
local-authority:BAB.joint-plan-name: Babergh and Mid Suffolk Local Plan
local-authority:BAB.notes: Shares local plan with Mid Suffolk

local-authority:MSU.name: Mid Suffolk District Council
local-authority:MSU.joint-plan-name: Babergh and Mid Suffolk Local Plan

local-authority:NDE.name: North Devon Council
local-authority:NDE.joint-plan-name: North Devon and Torridge Local Plan

local-authority:TOR.name: Torridge District Council
local-authority:TOR.joint-plan-name: North Devon and Torridge Local Plan
local-authority:TOR.notes: Shares local plan with North Devon

local-authority:PLY.name: Plymouth City Council
local-authority:PLY.joint-plan-name: Plymouth and South West Devon Local Plan
local-authority:PLY.notes: Shares local plan with South Hams and West Devon

local-authority:SHA.name: South Hams District Council
local-authority:SHA.joint-plan-name: Plymouth and South West Devon Local Plan
local-authority:SHA.notes: Shares local plan with Plymouth and West Devon

local-authority:WDE.name: West Devon District Council
local-authority:WDE.joint-plan-name: Plymouth and South West Devon Local Plan
local-authority:WDE.notes: Shares local plan with Plymouth and South Hams
